meanings.definition: A type of evergreen tree native to the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent1: The madronas in the forest provide shade and beauty.
meanings.sent2: I love hiking among the madronas and listening to the birds.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels play hide-and-seek around the madronas.
meanings.sent4: The madronas stand tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the madronas fills the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: The red-orange edible berries produced by the madrona tree.
meanings.sent1: I picked some ripe madronas to make jam.
meanings.sent2: The madronas add a burst of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The birds feast on the juicy madronas in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her lips stained red from eating madronas all day.
meanings.sent5: The sweet taste of madronas reminds me of summer days.

meanings.definition: The wood of the madrona tree, often used for furniture and decorative items.
meanings.sent1: The table was crafted from sturdy madronas wood.
meanings.sent2: The intricate carvings on the madronas wood are impressive.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat sharpened its claws on the madronas furniture.
meanings.sent4: The rich color of the madronas wood glowed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the madronas wood is a delight to touch.
